name: cru_precipitation_yearly
title: Yearly Precipication - CRU
description: Yearly precipitation from Climate Research Unit (CRU)
details: Created by averaging monthly precipitation data from CRU

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total precipitation of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Harris et al.(2014) Updated high‐resolution grids of monthly climatic observations – the CRU TS3.10 Dataset. doi:10.1002/joc.3711
